result.eng: Did you meet him?
result.ga: Ar chas tú leis
result.orig: Ar chas tú leis
result.html: Ar chas tú leisDid you meet him?
result.ponchtml: Ar ċas tú leisDid you meet him?

result.eng: Turn left!
result.ga: Cas ar chlé
result.orig: Cas ar chlé
result.html: Cas ar chléTurn left!
result.ponchtml: Cas ar ċléTurn left!

result.eng: Turn right at the second crossroads.
result.ga: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaire
result.orig: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaire
result.html: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.
result.ponchtml: Cas ar ḋeis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.

result.eng: Ráidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.
result.ga: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.orig: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.html: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na GaeltachtaRáidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na GaeltaċtaRáidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.

result.eng: It depends on how often the songs are played.
result.ga: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráin
result.orig: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráin
result.html: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráinIt depends on how often the songs are played.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag braṫ ar a ṁinice a ċastar na haṁráinIt depends on how often the songs are played.

result.eng: I'm happy to meet you, Cathal.
result.ga: Tá áthas orm casadh leat a Chathail
result.orig: Tá áthas orm casadh leat a Chathail
result.html: Tá áthas orm casadh leat a ChathailI'm happy to meet you, Cathal.
result.ponchtml: Tá áṫas orm casaḋ leat a ĊaṫailI'm happy to meet you, Cathal.

result.eng: I met Dara once already.
result.ga: Chas mé ar Dhara uair amháin cheana
result.orig: Chas mé ar Dhara uair amháin cheana
result.html: Chas mé ar Dhara uair amháin cheanaI met Dara once already.
result.ponchtml: Ċas mé ar Ḋara uair aṁáin ċeanaI met Dara once already.

result.eng: Do you play music at school?
result.ga: An gcasann tú sa scoil
result.orig: An gcasann tú sa scoil
result.html: An gcasann tú sa scoilDo you play music at school?
result.ponchtml: An gcasann tú sa scoilDo you play music at school?

result.eng: I don't play music.
result.ga: Ní chasaim
result.orig: Ní chasaim
result.html: Ní chasaimI don't play music.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċasaimI don't play music.

result.eng: I only sing in the house (at home).
result.ga: Ní chasaim ach amháin sa mbaile
result.orig: Ní chasaim ach amháin sa mbaile
result.html: Ní chasaim ach amháin sa mbaileI only sing in the house (at home).
result.ponchtml: Ní ċasaim aċ aṁáin sa mbaileI only sing in the house (at home).

result.eng: I sing a song or two.
result.ga: Casaim amhrán nó dhó
result.orig: Casaim amhrán nó dhó
result.html: Casaim amhrán nó dhóI sing a song or two.
result.ponchtml: Casaim aṁrán nó ḋóI sing a song or two.

result.eng: I play the guitar and the tin whistle.
result.ga: Casaim an giotár agus an fheadóg stáin
result.orig: Casaim an giotár agus an fheadóg stáin
result.html: Casaim an giotár agus an fheadóg stáinI play the guitar and the tin whistle.
result.ponchtml: Casaim an giotár agus an ḟeadóg stáinI play the guitar and the tin whistle.

result.eng: Where do you [usually] play your music?
result.ga: Cén áit a mbíonn sibh ag casadh bhur gcuid ceoil
result.orig: Cén áit a mbíonn sibh ag casadh bhur gcuid ceoil
result.html: Cén áit a mbíonn sibh ag casadh bhur gcuid ceoilWhere do you [usually] play your music?
result.ponchtml: Cén áit a mbíonn siḃ ag casaḋ ḃur gcuid ceoilWhere do you [usually] play your music?

result.eng: We [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.
result.ga: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-EabhracWe [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn muid ag casaḋ sna tiṫe táḃairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-EaḃracWe [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.

result.eng: And we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ga: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo
result.orig: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo
result.html: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seoAnd we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ponchtml: Agus beiḋ muid ag casaḋ sna tiṫe táḃairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireaḋ seaċtaine seoAnd we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.

result.eng: Did you meet my cousin Neilí Nic Dhonncha?
result.ga: Ar chas tú le mo chol ceathrar Neilí Nic Dhonncha
result.orig: Ar chas tú le mo chol ceathrar Neilí Nic Dhonncha
result.html: Ar chas tú le mo chol ceathrar Neilí Nic DhonnchaDid you meet my cousin Neilí Nic Dhonncha?
result.ponchtml: Ar ċas tú le mo ċol ceaṫrar Neilí Nic ḊonnċaDid you meet my cousin Neilí Nic Dhonncha?

result.eng: I didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.
result.ga: Níor chas ach tá neart daoine as Cois Fharraige fós ann
result.orig: Níor chas ach tá neart daoine as Cois Fharraige fós ann
result.html: Níor chas ach tá neart daoine as Cois Fharraige fós annI didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċas aċ tá neart daoine as Cois Ḟarraige fós annI didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.

result.eng: I met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ga: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.orig: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.html: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ponchtml: Ċas mé le cúpla seanċara as Baile na hAḃann nuair a ḃí mé ṫallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.

result.eng: Did you meet with a few old friends?
result.ga: Ar chas tú le cúpla seanchara

result.html: Ar chas tú le cúpla seancharaDid you meet with a few old friends?
result.ponchtml: Ar ċas tú le cúpla seanċaraDid you meet with a few old friends?

result.eng: What time will we meet together?

result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ċasfas muid le ċéileWhat time will we meet together?

result.ga: Cén áit a chasfas muid

result.ponchtml: Cén áit a ċasfas muidWhere will we meet?

result.eng: Where will I meet you?

result.html: Cén áit a chasfas mé leatWhere will I meet you?
result.ponchtml: Cén áit a ċasfas mé leatWhere will I meet you?

result.eng: I will meet you on the street corner.

result.eng: But it's nice to meet new people, too.

result.eng: Do you meet her much now?

result.eng: She flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
